ygData.subject: Re: Bard vs Wizard race?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh.  This is a great idea.  Next time you re doing a Freeport/Qeynos/Freeport or Freeport/Kelethin/Freeport run, put all your stuff in the bank (now that
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 5 Oct 1999, Wayne Sheppard wrote:
>
> If the race was serious, the bard could just suicide against a guard and be
> instantly teleported right back to Freeport, beating the wizard. Put all
> your stuff in the bank first to make it easier. And if you are worried
> about the experience loss, kill yourself instead. No exp loss there.

Heh. This is a great idea. Next time you're doing a
Freeport/Qeynos/Freeport or Freeport/Kelethin/Freeport run,
put all your stuff in the bank (now that no-drops will go in),
and kill yourself.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
